DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released. AK 2020-6-12 Created as part of the CDISC mapping task_ghd_08.24.18

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A variation from processes or procedures defined in a protocol. Deviations usually do not preclude the overall evaluability of subject data for either efficacy or safety, and are often acknowledged and accepted in advance by the sponsor. (CDISC Glossary)_A subdivision that has common differentiating characteristics within a larger category.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A description for something that exists in or is produced by nature, and is not artificial or man-made.: An unforeseen and unplanned event or circumstance frequently causing loss or injury.
